arts.ttl: Wolfsburg and Holstein Kiel share spoils in thrilling 2-2 draw
arts.sum: Patrick Wimmer came off the bench in second half to provide a goal and an assist for Wolfsburg, who were ultimately held to a 2-2 draw by Holstein Kiel. Holstein Kiel players celebrate after David Zec's surprise opener against Wolfsburg, catching the home side off guard.

arts.ttl: Holsten Kiel strikes late to grab point at Wolfsburg and end road losing streak
arts.sum: Relegation-threatened Holsten Kiel scored a late equalizer to draw at Wolfsburg 2-2 in the Bundesliga on Friday and snap a run of five consecutive away defeats. Three minutes later, Wind put Wolfsburg ahead when he headed home from a corner.

arts.ttl: Grabara blunder costs Wolfsburg in stalemate with Kiel
arts.sum: Bundesliga Matchday 19 kick-started with VfL Wolfsburg taking on Holstein Kiel in Lower Saxony. In the end, the spoils were shared in a 2-2 stalemate.

arts.ttl: Wolfsburg vs. Holstein Kiel preview: Can the visitors claim an elusive away victory?
arts.sum: Holstein Kiel will look to claim their first away win of the Bundesliga season when they travel to the Volkswagen Arena for Friday’s meeting with Wolfsburg.

arts.ttl: January’s LOI transfer updates: Ex-Barnsley midfielder Matty Wolfe signs for Sligo Rovers
arts.sum: The 32-year-old faced an uncertain future after his departure from Dundalk, following their relegation, but after a spell without a club he's agreed a move to Derry, fitting the age profile of other close-season signings like Shane Ferguson and Liam Boyce as Tiernan Lynch aims to build a side capable of challenging in 2025. Elsewhere, Drogheda United have secured the return of FAI Cup final man of the match Elicha Ahui on a season long loan after he signed a permanent deal with their partner club Walsall.

arts.ttl: Holstein Kiel confirm third winter signing
arts.sum: Holstein Kiel have further augmented their defensive ranks with another new signing.

Kiel still occupy an automatic relegation spot, despite winning two out of their last four games including a shock 4-2 win over hapless Borussia Dortmund. The Wolves have won only twice at home in ei...

arts.ttl: Preview: Wolfsburg vs. Holstein Kiel - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Friday's Bundesliga clash between Wolfsburg and Holstein Kiel, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
